titleStmt.title: First Judicial District of Colorado Territory

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: First Judicial District of Colorado Territory

body.p: This Colorado Territory judicial district included Arapahoe, Boulder, Douglas, Jefferson, Larimer, and Weld counties. Judge(s): Benjamin F. Hall.

ab.bibl:
General Laws, and Joint Resolutions, memorials and Private Acts, Passed at the Second Session of the Legislative Assembly of the Territory of Colorado, (Denver: Rocky Mountain News Printing Company, 1862), 60.
James K. Logan,The Federal Courts of the Tenth Circuit: A History, (U.S. Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit, 1992), p. 38-39.
